name: 賀一平
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week			Topics
1	Introduction
2	abortion
3	Marriage—for better or for worse
4	Cheating on your partner
5	Are you happy with your body?
6	Vanity
7	Animal rights
8	Animal rights; Quiz
9	Mid-term Exam and General Proficient Test
10	How to make a speech
11	How to write an application letter
12	The death penalty
13	The death penalty
14	Designer babies; Cloning
15	Legalizing drugs
16	Legalizing drugs; Quiz
17	Final Examination
18	General Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Evaluation: 
Oral presentations and quizzes: 30%
Mid-term and final exams: 40%
General proficient tests: 30%
